website_summaries.verdict: The Urbanears Active Reimers are attractive and affordable bass-forward earphones designed for the gym.
cons: Bass-heavy sound signature could use more balance in the highs

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money with minor issues
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to put in the ears but then they stay well. Unfortunately tangle easily. Also the material they are made of collects dirt easily (fuzz, threads etc). Sound is nice, color very nice, look good.
customer_reviews.author: Maja

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant earbuds! I love Urban Ears and these do not disappoint. Great vibrant colour and the usual great sound quality. Stay put as they should too.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Its great, but its not
customer_reviews.text: It's so good when you have it on, near perfect in ear headphones with the only thing I didn't like was how high the controller was. Here's what kills it, the ear buds keep falling off and within 2 days I've lost one of each so this might be be future proof just because this little issue that makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked wierd on
customer_reviews.text: I think the sound quality of these was good but they were much larger in real life and looked wierd in your ears
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth landen

customer_reviews.title: best headphone
customer_reviews.text: I have used urban air headphones for the last 5 years anchovy's won't change model as they are firm and good fit!
customer_reviews.author: caterina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, once you get used to how you put them in your ears without them falling out1
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Shropshire

customer_reviews.title: One of the earbuds not working..
customer_reviews.text: Right out off the box, the right earbud was not working.
customer_reviews.author: tango feroz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Liked them for the first 3 months I had them, then the left ear bud stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Gowlett

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds fall off too easy
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Earbud design if poo, they come of very easily and easy to loose too.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Munir Malik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant for all activates, never let me down.... would completely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for running
customer_reviews.text: Nice earbuds and do not fall easily from the ear especially running. Sound quality is also superb. Cables do not tangle.
customer_reviews.author: Oguz Karaman

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing sound quality. Unlike the rest of the urbanears products sound escapes these majorly and on top of that one ear stopped working after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Rashida Adekunle

product_meta.title: Urbanears - Reimers Earbuds for Apple - Black Belt
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Apple| Colour Name:Black Belt

The Ready-to-run Earbud
These lightweight workout earbuds have really got it together. Keep the focus on your pulse with perfect fit EarClick technology and a double clip that keeps everything in place.

EarClick
Run, laugh, or bust a move. The EarClick solution secures your earpiece firmly and comfortably in place.

Hands-Free Talking
The built-in mic and remote lets you pick up calls and skip between tracks without missing a beat.

Reflective Cable
Sweat bravely in the dark. Built-in reflection keep you extra visible during late night runs and 3 am walks with the dog.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Reimers Earbuds
